name: Core Release 30.5.0
description: This release of the Core APIs brings you some bug fixes and some improvements, see below for details on some of the more notable changes applied to the Core APIs.

FIXED.text: Updated how cookies were set during refresh of an expired cookie.
Added additional  webhook triggers for some login and registration workflows.
Updated mapping to support changes to Google ProfileImageURL.
Samesite attribute is set no defaulted to lax to resolve some browser compatibility issues.

IMPROVED.text: Optimized Webhook processing to improve deliverability.
